price: 80. Ya sólo, yo ozali na bokoki ya koyokisa bawei te, mpe koyokisa baye bakufa matoyi te, tango bakimi bapesi mokongo.
arabic: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innaka lā tus'miʿu al-mawtā walā tus'miʿu al-ṣuma al-duʿāa idhā wallaw mud'birīna
